com.rrs.corona.solutionsacceleratorstudio.solutionadapter
Class SolutionAdapterView

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.ui.part.WorkbenchPart
      org.eclipse.ui.part.ViewPart
          com.rrs.corona.solutionsacceleratorstudio.solutionadapter.SolutionAdapterView
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension, org.eclipse.ui.IPersistable, org.eclipse.ui.IViewPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart2, org.eclipse.ui.part.IWorkbenchPartOrientation
Direct Known Subclasses:
SaveAdapter
public class SolutionAdapterView
extends org.eclipse.ui.part.ViewPart

This class is used to provide the Solutions Adapter view in the left hand side of the SASPerspective.

This will create a new solutions adapter which contaisn the information about the IntermediateDataobject and Datasource

By creating a new adapter under the group then this will ask for the CMS server and Datasource to be populated in their respective view.

This view is mainly used to save and open the mapping relationship between the Datasource,IntermediateDataobject and the Project

Author:
Maha
